Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950000, which we believe is a fair and generous offer considering its worth. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would not only secure your acquisition but also ensure you receive exclusive benefits tailored to your preferences. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your possession. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
